about.title: Hi, I am
about.subtitle: I am a
text: I'm a goal-oriented Full Stack Developer with a strong focus on Frontend.
Experienced in building modern web applications using Vue, Laravel, and other technologies.
Comfortable working both independently and as part of a collaborative team — from architecture design to deployment.
Always striving to grow professionally, open to constructive feedback, and committed to writing clean, maintainable code.
My goal is not just to complete tasks, but to create thoughtful, scalable, and user-friendly solutions.

head.title: Skills

head.subtitle: My experience working as a web developer in various companies.

head.title: Projects
head.subtitle: During my time in the IT industry, I have created numerous projects, ranging from simple single-page websites and pet projects to large-scale e-commerce platforms, portals, and other websites.

head.title: Contacts
head.subtitle: Feel free to contact me with any questions or offers!
